ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: National University of Ireland, Galway (NUI Galway)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: National University of Ireland, Galway (NUI Galway)

TITLE.P: Call for expression of interest to ascertain the marketplace for providers of: Ultra clean system for pre-concentrating trace metals from seawater

SHORT_DESCR.P: NUI Galway is calling for Expressions of Interest from suppliers with the relevant expertise, experience and resources who are interested in and capable of providing a high performance, automated ultra clean sample introduction system for pre-concentrating trace metals from seawater or other high matrix media. The system should be compatible with direct mode applications through connections with an ICPMS as well as being able to be used in offline mode. The system must be also able to provide excellent accuracy and reproducibility with low blanks for trace metals.

Suppliers wishing to express their interest must complete the response for expression of interest form and return same by email only to nuigtenders@nuigalway.ie by 10:00 a.m. local time on Friday 26 January 2018. The response for expression of interest form is available for downloading from www.etenders.gov.ie (RFT 128842).

NUI Galway is calling for Expressions of Interest from suppliers with the relevant expertise, experience and resources who are interested in and capable of providing a high performance, automated ultra clean sample introduction system for pre-concentrating trace metals from seawater or other high matrix media. The system should be compatible for direct mode applications through connections with an ICPMS as well as being able to be used in offline mode. The system must be also able to provide excellent accuracy and reproducibility with low blanks for trace metals.

Suppliers wishing to express their interest must complete the Response for Expression of Interest Form and return same by email only to nuigtenders@nuigalway.ie by 10:00 a.m. local time on Friday 26 January 2018. The response for expression of interest form is available for downloading from www.etenders.gov.ie (RFT 128842).
